keyFacts: A civil lawsuit was filed against Jeffrey Epstein on January 17, 2020, by attorney Robert Glassman on behalf of a client.
The lawsuit received significant media coverage in outlets including the NY Daily News, NY Post, The Sun, and Daily Mail.
Judge John Koeltl and Magistrate Judge Barbara Moses were assigned to the civil case.
Investigators were planning to interview the client's family members and other contacts (including Howie Simon, Dr. Cabe, and John Larkin) as part of their corroboration process.
The client's mother was identified as a potentially key witness but was reported to be overseas, not in the US.
